name: Pass Your Driving Theory Test: 2010 Edition
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (UK) (from Ad Blurbs)

Brought to you by the publishers of the best-selling, award-winning, All-In-One Driving Test PC software!

Make your first test your last! Pass Your driving Theory Test is the essential interactive guide to help you pass your theory test, first time! Including the entire 1265 OFFICIAL DSA Theory Test questions for cars and motorcycles, new Case Studies for the 2010 Edition and featuring 5 test modes; Quick Test, DSA Test, Custom Test, the new Adbridged Theory Test and the OFFICIAL DSA Mock Theory Test. It's a great way to learn in the way that suits you best. Detailed feedback lets you analyse your performance across the 14 DSA Theory Test categories, so you can tailor your revision where it's most needed. Everything you need to ensure success on the day!
